data.prayer: Father, make bold the prophets in GrandGedeh, Liberia so that the church can be equipped with truth and insight and a vision of your heart.
data.verse: These are the things which you should do: speak the truth to one another; judge with truth and judgment for peace in your gates.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of GrandGedeh, Liberia
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Father, we pray for every movement leader and disciple in the state of GrandGedeh, Liberia that they would have deepening intimacy with you.
data.verse: On that day you will realize that I am in my Father, and you are in me, and I am in you.

data.prayer: Father, you have chosen the weak things of this world to confound the strong. Make the poor and outcast in the state of GrandGedeh a testimony of your strength.
data.verse: God chose the foolish things of the world that he might put to shame those who are wise. God chose the weak things of the world, that he might put to shame the things that are strong;

data.prayer: Father, please send new apostles into the harvest, who can open up new communities for the gospel in the state of GrandGedeh, Liberia.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Spirit, fill the 17,293 believers in the state of GrandGedeh with tears, because God is not obeyed by those around them.
data.verse: Streams of tears flow from my eyes, for your law is not obeyed.

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the children in the state of GrandGedeh to pray with passion and pleading for your presence.
Spirit, please equip every disciple to make disciples who make disciples in the state of GrandGedeh.
data.verse: And the things you have heard me say in the presence of many witnesses entrust to reliable people who will also be qualified to teach others.

data.section_summary:
the state of GrandGedeh, Liberia has a population of 148,100.

We estimate GrandGedeh has 17,293 people who might know Jesus, 41,981 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 88,825 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 8 neighbors who need Jesus.
